name: Buffer File
summary: A BUF file is a buffer file used by various programs, such as SQL*Plus and GNU Emacs. It contains data for a short time and then is erased. BUF files are not meant to be opened.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Not meant to be opened, only used for temporary storage

macos.display_name: Not meant to be opened, only used for temporary storage
